title: Spaghetti Carbonara
summary: A classic Italian pasta dish with eggs, cheese, bacon, and black pepper.
instructions: Cook the spaghetti according to the package instructions.
In a pan, cook the pancetta with garlic until crispy.
In a bowl, beat the eggs and mix with grated Parmesan cheese.
Drain the spaghetti and toss with pancetta and garlic.
Remove from heat and quickly mix in the egg and cheese mixture.
Season with salt and pepper to taste, and serve immediately.

title: Chicken Tikka Masala
summary: Chunks of grilled chicken (tikka) cooked in a smooth buttery & creamy tomato based gravy.
instructions: Marinate chicken in yogurt and tikka masala spice mix for at least 2 hours.
Grill or cook chicken until fully cooked and set aside.
In a pan, sauté onions and garlic until soft.
Add diced tomatoes and cook for 10 minutes.
Stir in heavy cream and cook for another 5 minutes.
Add grilled chicken to the sauce and simmer for 10 minutes.
Season with salt and pepper, and serve with rice or naan.

title: Beef Stroganoff
summary: A creamy, savory dish made with tender beef strips in a mushroom and onion sauce.
instructions: Slice beef into strips and season with salt and pepper.
In a pan, sauté onions and garlic until soft.
Add beef and cook until browned.
Stir in flour and cook for 1 minute.
Add mushrooms and beef broth, and simmer until the beef is tender.
Stir in sour cream and cook until heated through.
Serve over noodles or rice.

title: Vegetable Stir-Fry
summary: A quick and healthy stir-fry with a mix of fresh vegetables in a savory sauce.
ingredients: 2 cups mixed vegetables (bell peppers, broccoli, carrots)
1 tablespoon cornstarch mixed with 2 tablespoons water
instructions: Heat oil in a pan and sauté garlic and ginger until fragrant.
Add vegetables and stir-fry until crisp-tender.
Mix soy sauce and hoisin sauce, and pour over vegetables.
Stir in the cornstarch mixture and cook until the sauce has thickened.
Serve with rice or noodles.
